about.summary: A graphics device for R that is accessible via network protocols. This package was created to make it easier to embed live R graphics in integrated development environments and other applications. The included 'HTML/JavaScript' client (plot viewer) aims to provide a better overall user experience when dealing with R graphics. The device asynchronously serves graphics via 'HTTP' and 'WebSockets'.

A graphics device for R that is accessible via network protocols. This package was created to make it easier to embed live R graphics in integrated development environments and other applications. The included 'HTML/JavaScript' client (plot viewer) aims to provide a better overall user experience when dealing with R graphics. The device asynchronously serves graphics via 'HTTP' and 'WebSockets'.

name: r-httpgd

about.summary: A graphics device for R that is accessible via network protocols. This package was created to make it easier to embed live R graphics in integrated development environments and other applications. The included 'HTML/JavaScript' client (plot viewer) aims to provide a better overall user experience when dealing with R graphics. The device asynchronously serves graphics via 'HTTP' and 'WebSockets'.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.3.1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-httpgd
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/httpgd_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/httpgd/httpgd_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 6dbfe3aaf70a004abb92268a80816bb604033b094d46420ba14f3ffaf13adaee

build:
  skip: true  # [win]
  merge_build_host: true  # [win]
  number: 1
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}              # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_c') }}        # [win]
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}            # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_cxx') }}      # [win]
    - {{ posix }}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}sed               # [win]
    - {{ posix }}grep              # [win]
    - {{ posix }}autoconf
    - {{ posix }}automake          # [not win]
    - {{ posix }}automake-wrapper  # [win]
    - {{ posix }}pkg-config
    - {{ posix }}make
    - {{ posix }}coreutils         # [win]
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-bh >=1.75.0
    - r-cpp11 >=0.2.4
    - r-later >=1.1.0
    - r-systemfonts >=1.0.0
    - r-rmarkdown
    - cairo
    - libpng
    - libzlib
    # using glib instead of libglib, see https://github.com/conda-forge/weasyprint-feedstock/issues/23
    - glib                      # [osx] 
    - isabelle-client           # [win] 
  run:
    - r-base
    - {{ native }}gcc-libs         # [win]
    - r-bh >=1.75.0
    - r-cpp11 >=0.2.4
    - r-later >=1.1.0
    - r-systemfonts >=1.0.0
    - r-rmarkdown
    - cairo
    - libpng
    - libzlib
    # using glib instead of libglib, see https://github.com/conda-forge/weasyprint-feedstock/issues/23
    - glib                      # [osx]    

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('httpgd')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('httpgd')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/nx10/httpgd, https://nx10.github.io/httpgd/
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: A graphics device for R that is accessible via network protocols. This package was created to make it easier to embed live R graphics in integrated development environments and other applications. The included 'HTML/JavaScript' client (plot viewer) aims to provide a better overall user experience when dealing
    with R graphics. The device asynchronously serves graphics via 'HTTP' and 'WebSockets'.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2
    - {{ environ["SRC_DIR"] }}/inst/licenses/belle-MIT.txt
    - {{ environ["SRC_DIR"] }}/inst/licenses/fmt-MIT.txt
    - {{ environ["SRC_DIR"] }}/inst/licenses/material-design-icons-Apache-2-0.txt
    - {{ environ["SRC_DIR"] }}/inst/licenses/svglite-GPL-2.txt
extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - nsandau
